title: Biden Has COVID: Can We FINALLY Tell the Truth About Vaccines? | Guests: Eric Schmitt & Steve Deace | 7/22/22
description:
Glenn and Pat debate which first lady is worse: Hillary Clinton or Jill Biden. NPR noticed there might be some conflicts of interest in Ukraine three years after Glenn sounded the alarm. The FBI is auditing concealed carry permit holders in Missouri, and Missouri AG Eric Schmitt joins to explain what's being done to stop it. Bill O'Reilly covers the week's most important news including President Biden's COVID diagnosis. Author Michael Malice joins to expose the dangers of the Left labeling everybody it disagrees with as being part of the far Right. BlazeTV host Steve Deace of "The Steve Deace Show" joins to discuss Biden's COVID diagnosis, vaccines, and the Left's plan to politicize monkeypox. Glenn discusses the importance of dialing back the power of the president.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
